revised_title: Investigations on Subsalts: Arseniates, Phosphates, and Phosphoric Acid Modifications
tldr: The author explores the properties and formation of subsalts, specifically arseniates and phosphates, and their modifications. He investigates the subarseniate and subphosphate of soda, their solubility, and their reactions with various reagents. The author also discusses the differences between phosphoric and pyrophosphoric acids and their respective properties.
